title: The title of hyperlink builder should be 'Hyperlink Options', now it changes with settings.
OB: When opening the hyperlink builder, the title displayed is not 'Hyperlink Options', but it changes based on the current settings.
EB: When opening the hyperlink builder, the title should always be 'Hyperlink Options' regardless of the current settings.
SR:
To reproduce this issue: 
1. Open the hyperlink builder. 
2. Verify that the title displayed is not 'Hyperlink Options' but changes based on the current settings.
